text:
It does not support the nested elements include, exclude, nor dtd. It is quite 
useless without these, for all but tutorial development.

With any of the nested elements it reports the following:

E:\Development\dcp\modules\referenceApp\build.xml:85: Class org.apache.tools.ant
.taskdefs.optional.ejb.IPlanetDeploymentTool doesn't support the nested "include
" element.

Bret
creator: bret_hansen@hotmail.com

text:
It is not the iplanet nested element which supports these elements but <ejbjar>
itself. The iplanet nested element gets any required info from the main task.
creator: conor@apache.org
